location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Captain Robert Taylor, Resident at Bussora [Basra], to James Dow, in charge of the Residency at Bushire

mods.abstract: In the letter Taylor informs Dow that there is a packet addressed to the Honourable the Governor in Council, presently on board the Udry, and requests that Bruce forward it to the Presidency on the Udryor the Benares, whichever is likely to reach Bombay first.
